info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 01 at 5:16PM MST until January 02 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 expected. * WHERE...Tucson Metro Area and South Central Pinal County. * WHEN...From midnight Saturday night to 9 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
